Representation

SortList is made up of multiple rows of items which can contain html, markdown, MathJax or text content. You specify the rows by initializing the property items of the component which is an array of SortItem objects. A SortItem object has the following properties: 

{
    "id": string, // id of the item.
    "content": string, // HTML, markdown, MathJax or textual content of the item.
    "css": string, // optional css classes of the component separated by a space.
}
